review: 你们再不给ow2刷差评，我可要给三国杀，崩坏三，鬼谷八荒刷好评了

Дважды переваренный леволиберальный кал, скачал эту поделку лишь для того, чтоб оставить негативный отзыв не только за обилие пидopoв, лесбиянок, потраченные в пустую 500 часов, но и за невозможность установить игру на территории России.
不为什么，就是想给个差评，嘻嘻。

为什么要给wo2差评呢？是因为在考迪克的死🐎操作之下如果这个游戏还能有好评甚至中评，那么其他的厂商就会自然认为玩家意见、玩家体验、玩家权益都不重要，从而出现第二个第三个甚至更多的考迪克，所有这不仅仅是玩家对于暴雪的报复，而是玩家对于所有游戏厂商的警告。玩家喜欢你，你就可以是年度游戏，但如果你不把玩家当回事，那你也不过就是玩家手中刷差评的地方罢了。

我作为一个曾经的暴雪玩家，诚挚祝愿，考迪克亲妈横死街头，全家被掘坟。

呸

守望先锋：归西，给暴雪一点3%的小小震撼

如何在不下载游戏的情况下愉快的打差评
评测条件：通过挂时长软件添加游戏累计6分钟即可

PC端：
watt toolkit（原steam++）
ASF
SAM

移动端：
云挂卡APP
如何从库中移除游戏
主页 > 帐户 > 许可和产品序列号激活：点击移除即可
或者
客服 >> 我想从帐户中移除这款游戏

来点客观评价
暴雪、考迪克死一死的话估计无数人在刷了，总要谈点客观的，不然会有些自觉中立的人说点未经他人苦，却劝他人善的风凉话

先说公事：
停更几年，画了N年大饼的守望先锋2就是这玩意？改动还没个版本更新大，这些年员工都在忙什么？办公室性骚扰？看看当年守望2预告CG动画里老玩家的弹幕，现今看来只有2个字：心寒。逼肝骗氪就不说了，反正暴雪现在也就只会这个，我的战役模式呢？信誓旦旦的PVE一拖再拖，张口就是为了玩家更好的体验这些晦涩难懂的词。

再聊私事：
账号承载着老玩家的青春回忆，见证了和朋友一起欢笑犯糗的时光。你说没就没，这就是您说的为了玩家？向钱看嘛，不寒掺，哪怕您站直了脊梁骨，说几句真话，我对您的鄙夷也能少那么几分，来洗的暴白也会多一点。中国玩家不重要，但中国玩家的真金白银很重要。


新玩家的避坑理由
在这里，你能感受到如同上班一样的游玩快感
在这里，你会发现皮肤出的比版本更新更加勤快
在这里，你可以体会到原汁原味的正宗暴雪式傲慢
在这里，你能够看到无数新的承诺簇拥出的艰难决定
在这里，你将游玩一个拒绝中国市场和中国玩家的高贵洋产，玩之前，先低头再折腰。

结语：
再不刷差评，我可要给三国杀打好评了哦

OH boy where should I start!

I have over 900 hours in the two games combined (mainly ow1) and have been the highest rank in the game which is grandmaster for 4 years and all I can say is wow.
activision blizzard somehow managed to gut an amazing unique game that was ow1 and turn it into a cash grabbing money hungry pile of crap.

They content starved the original better game and promised that they were working hard on ow2 and its "pve" only for them to scrap the pve all together like absolute clowns.
This company has lied to its players and has outed itself for the world to see just how scummy they are.
Overwatch 2 is a downgrade in every way imaginable, the decision to go from 6v6 to 5v5 might be the dumbest decision of them all, it literally doesn't work due to so many original heroes being made for 6v6. 5v5 makes the game require less strategy and team play which also results in a chain reaction of terrible hero design and balance issues (like I said due to heroes not being made for 5v5).

5v5 has made solo tanking an absolute nightmare to play and has removed the fun of tank coordination that the first game provided. 5v5 has also ruined unique hero designs such as doomfist sombra orisa etc but mainly doomfist who used to have a unique fun to play kit that got gutted as he was transferred from dps to the tank role replacing his uppercut with a boring block and his indicator slam with a budget winston leap all whilst losing his signature one shot rocket punch.
decisions like 5v5 have resulted in the game and heroes being dumbed down and has managed to remove a lot of uniqueness that the original game had. 5v5 just straight up doesn't work.

Next on the list we have the horrendous balance, hero design, matchmaking and ranked currently in the game.
The balance team outright has no idea what they're doing and create seasonal balance issues that result in certain heroes being overpowered for months on end. Constantly overbuffing heroes that don't need buffs and keeping certain heroes weak just to appease lower ranks isn't true balance and it kills the game at the higher ranks where balance actually matters. They've gone on record saying they take all ranks into account when balancing which sounds nice yeh but when you look at it objectively as a competitive style game it literally doesn't work and only creates more issues.

The matchmaker is something else, In overwatch 1 games felt properly balanced and fair instead of complete gambles. In overwatch 2 its a toss up and the game is decided on whoever gets the boosted overwatch 1 plat player that is somehow now gm in overwatch 2 thanks to blizzards terrible new ranked system! 
The ranked system is also complete ass compared to ow1, you can no longer see your sr or your sr gains/losses after a win or loss. Instead you have to slug through 5 wins or 15 losses to get a rank change...

The hero design has been classic blizzard tbh, recently they love releasing overpowered easy to play heroes like sojourn, kiriko and junkerqueen. It feels like they're not even play testing these heroes before releasing them because holy cow they're so overpowered on release its insane and it ruins the games balance for months on end after said release.

The shop prices In this game are straight up predatory, you have skin bundles costing up to $60 which is insane and on top of that they charge you real life money for old overwatch 1 skins that were FREE. This whole "sequel" has been a piss poor excuse to implement a shop and battlepass system so they can make more money.
The battle pass also doesn't give you your coins back like other battle passes in games such as fortnite, deceive inc and many others. It's genuinely scummy behaviour from blizzard.

My friends and I used to play overwatch 1 for hours daily. With ow2 none of us can even stand a few qp games before quitting, It's genuinely one of the worst games and sequels that I've ever played.
And the worst part is, blizzard forced us to move onto ow2 because they knew that a good portion of the community would stay on overwatch 1 due to the "new and improved sequel" being worse than the original in every single way.  

This game is a joke and all they want is your money, they don't care about any of the players or the state of the game. DO NOT SPEND MONEY ON THIS ABYSMAL GAME AND DON'T BOTHER TO INSTALL IT.
Best game I've ever played. Overwhelmingly negative my ass, this is astounding top notch AAA material. Thank you blizzard, keep up the amazing work.

从来不写评测，但是看见这样一款怀旧射击游戏上线，我必须上来说点什么！简直是怒从心头起，恶向胆边生！算了~千言万语道不尽，一个向下的大拇指代表了一切！

为了这个比游戏差评才下回来的，刚进去玩了一下训练场，优化是谢特，注册界面默认繁体文，不是说繁体文不好，但我默认语言选的是简体中文奥，其次是国际服平台。游戏是个好游戏，可惜狗笔运营和公司是个傻逼，不把国人正眼看，又TM的想要中国的市场，可谓是狗吃屎都比这暴雪好看，之前和网易谈崩的时候，认为有下一个托盘侠可以接手，没想到没人要这个小瘪三，最后还想舔着老脸去求“复合”，虽然网易也不行但是人家确实也为了玩家着想，只能说暴雪你妈妈全家死了，看着商店页面底下的那个组合包，我们这些买的一的国服玩家现在是一点好处都没有，还有上次的暗黑破坏神事件后觉得你要想能在中国市场里混，你就得为中国人着想，不要以为你那个比游戏真的很好了，看着你的烂运营，以后的路不好走了，你也别指望着找推广了，垃圾公司，现在才知道，这个是没有国服的，也就是说你玩的本质上是国际服，你曾经国服上的一切都没有了，而且跟网易的条件已经有半年多了，那么国服玩家的数据也就全都清空了，你妈妈比的，垃圾暴雪，你干的丑事，像个弱智一样，以前买了游戏还会掉箱子，能白嫖金什么的，现在好了什么都没了，把以前的皮肤标价出来卖，你奶奶的可真会赚钱啊。再次一句，这个比游戏可以玩，但是傻逼公司的做法和吃相丑态百出说白了上架steam，你还得去下载战网平台，依旧是个孬子。垃圾，免费游玩，没有几个英雄给你玩，我之前喜欢的DVA都被这傻逼搞了一套打目标才解锁的条件，跟某个游戏很像，之前国服锁了，国人跑外服去了，还把国际服的游戏币汇率改高了，真的难崩，真把我们当成弱智了是吧，狗比游戏，谢特，谢特。直接把尼玛吊起来操

• Removal of 6v6 - down to 5v5
• "Overwatch Coins" are an artificial currency used for micro transactions and designed to get you to waste money and buy a 
bulk of a pre-set number of coins and waste money rather than straight up buy something.
• Name changing heroes named after a long history of some of it's disgusting developer's actions.
• Blizzard are against free speech - the "Blitzchung incident"
• Ingame cosmetic key chains cost more than the same physical key chains they sell on their store.

Blizzard were my favourite game developers. They are now hollow puppets that will take every opportunity to exploit their customers, employees, and IPs. They have no integrity and are happy to introduce full pay to win or pay to progress elements to their games - they'll get their foot in the door with casual pet cosmetics and slowly work their way up to to full on Pay-to-Win.

猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
曾经是个好游戏，之前爱玩，现在我也爱玩，但不妨碍这游戏后面的一团稀烂，暴雪就是个大傻逼，铁脑瘫，考迪克的迪克被烤成焦炭才能对得起名字和所作所为。英雄不巧。
